  hi!

  I=
 have made some excercises both with cactus and with junitee at
  http://so=
urceforge.net/projects/junitee/

  As I can see after my short experiences
=
  Both Cactus and JunitEE can be used to test session beans!

  1) 
  +Cact=
us can test also jsp objects such as request, session etc
  +Cactus seems t=
o have a very strong project working on it.
  -Cactus needs to be installed=
 both on server and client which makes 
  it a bit more difficult to use.
 =
 -Cactus testcases are not standard JUnit Testcases 

  2)
  +JunitEE is lo=
cated in the J2EE server and you access it using 
  browser 
  +JunitEE use=
s standard JUnit testcases
  -JunitEE cannot test jsp-objects like request,=
 session etc
  -JunitEE is a small project (e.g. me). But it is simple too.=


  Please correct me if I'm wrong somewhere!

  JunitEE project has been v=
ery quiet but I like it!
  I like Cactus too and have difficulties in decid=
ing
  what I want to use!

  Kaarle Kaila

  > gopala krishnan T wrote:
  >=

  > > i would like to know, how to test session beans, i mean=
 is

an early reply is appreciated.

  ..........
